TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit IndentedTextWriter extends System.IO.TextWriter

Docs.summary: Provides a text writer that can indent new lines by a tab string token.

remarks.format:
## Remarks <xref:System.CodeDom.Compiler.IndentedTextWriter> extends a <xref:System.IO.TextWriter> by providing methods that insert a tab string and track the current indentation level. Text formatted with multiple indentation levels is useful for generated code, so this class is used by CodeDOM code generator implementations.
The tab string is the string that each indentation consists of. Typically the tab string contains white space.
> [!NOTE] > This class contains a link demand and an inheritance demand at the class level that applies to all members. A <xref:System.Security.SecurityException> is thrown when either the immediate caller or the derived class does not have full-trust permission. For details about security demands, see [Link Demands](~/docs/framework/misc/link-demands.md) and [Inheritance Demands](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/x4yx82e6(v=vs.100)).
## Examples The following code example demonstrates using an <xref:System.CodeDom.Compiler.IndentedTextWriter> to write text at different levels of indentation.
[!code-cpp[IndentedTextWriterExample#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/IndentedTextWriterExample/CPP/form1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[IndentedTextWriterExample#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/IndentedTextWriterExample/CS/form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[IndentedTextWriterExample#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/IndentedTextWriterExample/VB/form1.vb#1)]

Docs.permission: for full trust for the immediate caller. This class cannot be used by partially trusted code.
for full trust for inheritors. This class cannot be inherited by partially trusted code.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The default tab string consists of a single white space. (" ")

remarks.format:
## Examples The following code example demonstrates setting the indentation level of an <xref:System.CodeDom.Compiler.IndentedTextWriter>. The indentation level is the number of tab strings to prefix each line with.
[!code-cpp[IndentedTextWriterExample#3](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/IndentedTextWriterExample/CPP/form1.cpp#3)] [!code-csharp[IndentedTextWriterExample#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/IndentedTextWriterExample/CS/form1.cs#3)] [!code-vb[IndentedTextWriterExample#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/IndentedTextWriterExample/VB/form1.vb#3)]
